preConditions.neo4j:cypherCheck: SHOW PROCEDURES YIELD name WHERE name = "apoc.schema.assert" RETURN count(name)

changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CALL apoc.schema.assert({Movie:['tagline'], Movie:['released'], Person:['name'], Movie:['imdbRating'], User:['name'], Movie:['title'], Movie:['year']}, {}, true)

changeSet.author: liquibase-fan
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CREATE CONSTRAINT cst_movie_IMDB_id FOR (m:Movie) REQUIRE (m.imdbId) IS NODE KEY

changeSet.author: liquibase-fan
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: MATCH (m:Movie) WHERE m.plot IS NULL SET m.plot=m.title

changeSet.author: liquibase-fan
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CREATE CONSTRAINT cst_movie_plot FOR (m:Movie) REQUIRE (m.plot) IS NOT NULL

changeSet.author: liquibase-fan
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CREATE CONSTRAINT country_name_string FOR (country:Country) REQUIRE country.name IS ::STRING

rollback.neo4j:cypher: MATCH (country:Country)<-[:IN_COUNTRY]-(movie:Movie) SET movie.countries = country.names DETACH DELETE country

changeSet.author: liquibase-fan
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: MATCH (old:Country WHERE old.names IS NOT NULL) UNWIND old.names AS rawName WITH trim(rawName) AS name WITH DISTINCT name MERGE (:Country {name: name})

MATCH (new:Country WHERE new.name IS NOT NULL) MATCH (old:Country WHERE old.names IS NOT NULL AND new.name IN old.names)<-[:IN_COUNTRY]-(movie:Movie) CREATE (new)<-[:IN_COUNTRY]-(movie) DETACH DELETE old

rollback.neo4j:cypher: MATCH (movie:Movie)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country) WITH movie, collect(country.name) AS names CREATE (:Country {names: names})<-[:IN_COUNTRY]-(movie)
MATCH (country:Country WHERE country.name IS NOT NULL) DETACH DELETE country
